metadataAttributes.Title: AWS Cloud Practitioner Essentials
metadataAttributes.Short Intro: Welcome to AWS Cloud Practitioner Essentials. If you’re new to the cloud, whether you’re in a technical or non-technical role such as finance, legal, sales, marketing, this course will provide you with an understanding of fundamental AWS Cloud concepts to help you gain confidence to contribute to your organization’s cloud initiatives. This course is also the starting point to prepare for your AWS Certified Cloud Practitioner certification whenever it’s convenient for you.
metadataAttributes.Skills: Cloud Computing Security,AWS cloud,cloud networking,Cloud Computing,Migration and Innovation,
